title: Paladin (role)
data:
- - *For the Infidel quest nemesis, see [Paladin (monster)](/wiki/Paladin_\(monster\) "Paladin (monster)").*
  - *For the rank title, see [Knight](/wiki/Knight "Knight").*

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

*"replace with SlashTHEM data (role.c:914): first sac gift, starting attributes, HP/Pw, special spell [remove curse](/wiki/Remove_curse "Remove curse") (Wis), CoC"*

The **Paladin** is a [role](/wiki/Role "Role") that appears in [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM").

Paladins are always [lawful](/wiki/Lawful "Lawful"), and can be [humans](/wiki/Human_\(starting_race\) "Human (starting race)"), [elves](/wiki/Elf_\(starting_race\) "Elf (starting race)"), [dwarves](/wiki/Dwarf_\(starting_race\) "Dwarf (starting race)") or [giants](/wiki/Giant_\(starting_race\) "Giant (starting race)").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Starting inventory](#Starting_inventory)
- [2 Skills](#Skills)
- [3 Intrinsics](#Intrinsics)
- [4 Techniques](#Techniques)
- [5 Quest](#Quest)
- [6 Gods](#Gods)
- [7 Rank titles](#Rank_titles)

## Starting inventory

- a blessed +1 [silver short sword](/wiki/Silver_short_sword "Silver short sword")
- a blessed +1 [ring mail](/wiki/Ring_mail "Ring mail")
- a blessed +0 [helmet](/wiki/Helmet "Helmet")
- a blessed +0 [small shield](/wiki/Small_shield "Small shield")
- a blessed +0 pair of [leather gloves](/wiki/Leather_gloves "Leather gloves")
- 2 blessed potions of [holy water](/wiki/Holy_water "Holy water")
- 2 blessed [cloves of garlic](/wiki/Cloves_of_garlic "Cloves of garlic")
- 2 blessed [sprigs of wolfsbane](/wiki/Sprigs_of_wolfsbane "Sprigs of wolfsbane")
- a blessed [spellbook of healing](/wiki/Spellbook_of_healing "Spellbook of healing")
- a random blessed [scroll](/wiki/Scroll "Scroll")
- 10% chance of a cursed [magic marker](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker"); otherwise:
  - 10% chance of either a cursed +1 [oil lamp](/wiki/Oil_lamp "Oil lamp") or two cursed [torches](/wiki/Torch "Torch") (equal probability)

The starting pet is always a [pony](/wiki/Pony "Pony") with a [saddle](/wiki/Saddle "Saddle").

## Skills

Their skillset is a mesh of the Knight and Priest:

| Paladin skills |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| -------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Max            | Skills                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| Basic          | - *Weapons:* [dagger](/wiki/Dagger "Dagger"), [knife](/wiki/Knife "Knife"), [scimitar](/wiki/Scimitar "Scimitar"), [sling](/wiki/Sling "Sling"), [dart](/wiki/Dart "Dart"), [hammer](/wiki/Hammer "Hammer"), [javelin](/wiki/Javelin "Javelin"), [trident](/wiki/Trident "Trident"), [bow](/wiki/Bow "Bow")                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| Skilled        | * *Weapons:* [broadsword](/wiki/Broadsword "Broadsword"), [long sword](/wiki/Long_sword "Long sword"), [two-handed sword](/wiki/Two-handed_sword "Two-handed sword"), [saber](/wiki/Saber "Saber"), [morning star](/wiki/Morning_star "Morning star"), [spear](/wiki/Spear "Spear"), [lance](/wiki/Lance "Lance"), [crossbow](/wiki/Crossbow "Crossbow")
* *Spells:* [healing](/wiki/Healing_spells "Healing spells"), [protection](/wiki/Protection_spells "Protection spells"), [twoweapon](/wiki/Twoweapon "Twoweapon") |
| Expert         | - *Weapons:* [short sword](/wiki/Short_sword "Short sword"), [club](/wiki/Club "Club"), [mace](/wiki/Mace "Mace"), [quarterstaff](/wiki/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff"), [polearms](/wiki/Polearms "Polearms")
- *Combat*: [riding](/wiki/Riding "Riding"), [bare hands](/wiki/Bare_hands "Bare hands")
- *Spells:* [divination](/wiki/Divination "Divination")                                                                                                                                                               |

## Intrinsics

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

*"can't find in attrib.c"*

Paladins gain the following [intrinsics](/wiki/Intrinsic "Intrinsic"):

- XL 1: Warning against undead
- XL 1: Warning against demons
- XL 1: [Speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed")
- XL 5: [Poison resistance](/wiki/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance")
- XL 10: [Sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance")
- XL 24: [leech mana](/index.php?title=Leech_mana\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Leech mana (page does not exist)")

## Techniques

- XL 1: [turn undead](/wiki/Turn_undead "Turn undead")
- XL 3: [shield block](/wiki/Shield_block "Shield block")
- XL 5: [blessing](/wiki/Blessing "Blessing")
- XL 10: [healing hands](/wiki/Healing_hands "Healing hands")

## Quest

[Erec](/index.php?title=Erec\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Erec (page does not exist)") sends you to fight [Alduin](/index.php?title=Alduin\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Alduin (page does not exist)") for the [Cudgel of Cuthbert](/index.php?title=Cudgel_of_Cuthbert\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Cudgel of Cuthbert (page does not exist)"). The maps are copies from the [Knight quest](/wiki/Knight_quest "Knight quest"), filled with [dragons](/wiki/Dragon "Dragon"). Random monster generation is biased towards [human zombies](/wiki/Human_zombie "Human zombie") and [wraiths](/wiki/Wraith "Wraith").

## Gods

Like [Priests](/wiki/Priest "Priest"), their pantheon is randomly chosen from one of the other roles.

## Rank titles

- XL 1-2: Undefiler
- XL 3-5: Faithful
- XL 6-9: Religious One
- XL 10-13: Returned One
- XL 14-17: Sacred One
- XL 18-21: Savior
- XL 22-25: Celestial
- XL 26-29: Decomposer
- XL 30: Annihilator
html:
Paladin (role)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
For the Infidel quest nemesis, see Paladin (monster).
For the rank title, see Knight.

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

"replace with SlashTHEM data (role.c:914): first sac gift, starting attributes, HP/Pw, special spell remove curse (Wis), CoC"

The Paladin is a role that appears in SlashTHEM.

Paladins are always lawful, and can be humans, elves, dwarves or giants.

Contents

  • 1 Starting inventory
  • 2 Skills
  • 3 Intrinsics
  • 4 Techniques
  • 5 Quest
  • 6 Gods
  • 7 Rank titles

Starting inventory

  • a blessed +1 silver short sword
  • a blessed +1 ring mail
  • a blessed +0 helmet
  • a blessed +0 small shield
  • a blessed +0 pair of leather gloves
  • 2 blessed potions of holy water
  • 2 blessed cloves of garlic
  • 2 blessed sprigs of wolfsbane
  • a blessed spellbook of healing
  • a random blessed scroll
  • 10% chance of a cursed magic marker; otherwise:
    • 10% chance of either a cursed +1 oil lamp or two cursed torches (equal probability)

The starting pet is always a pony with a saddle.

Skills

Their skillset is a mesh of the Knight and Priest:

Paladin skills
Max Skills
Basic
  • Weapons: dagger, knife, scimitar, sling, dart, hammer, javelin, trident, bow
Skilled
  • Weapons: broadsword, long sword, two-handed sword, saber, morning star, spear, lance, crossbow
  • Spells: healing, protection, twoweapon
Expert
  • Weapons: short sword, club, mace, quarterstaff, polearms
  • Combat: riding, bare hands
  • Spells: divination

Intrinsics

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

"can't find in attrib.c"

Paladins gain the following intrinsics:

  • XL 1: Warning against undead
  • XL 1: Warning against demons
  • XL 1: Speed
  • XL 5: Poison resistance
  • XL 10: Sleep resistance
  • XL 24: leech mana

Techniques

  • XL 1: turn undead
  • XL 3: shield block
  • XL 5: blessing
  • XL 10: healing hands

Quest

Erec sends you to fight Alduin for the Cudgel of Cuthbert. The maps are copies from the Knight quest, filled with dragons. Random monster generation is biased towards human zombies and wraiths.

Gods

Like Priests, their pantheon is randomly chosen from one of the other roles.

Rank titles

  • XL 1-2: Undefiler
  • XL 3-5: Faithful
  • XL 6-9: Religious One
  • XL 10-13: Returned One
  • XL 14-17: Sacred One
  • XL 18-21: Savior
  • XL 22-25: Celestial
  • XL 26-29: Decomposer
  • XL 30: Annihilator

The '''Paladin''' is a [[role]] that appears in [[SlashTHEM]]. 

Paladins are always [[lawful]], and can be [[Human (starting race)|humans]], [[Elf (starting race)|elves]], [[Dwarf (starting race)|dwarves]] or [[Giant (starting race)|giants]].

==Starting inventory==
* a blessed +1 [[silver short sword]]
* a blessed +1 [[ring mail]]
* a blessed +0 [[helmet]]
* a blessed +0 [[small shield]]
* a blessed +0 pair of [[leather gloves]]
* 2 blessed potions of [[holy water]]
* 2 blessed [[cloves of garlic]]
* 2 blessed [[sprigs of wolfsbane]]
* a blessed [[spellbook of healing]]
* a random blessed [[scroll]]
* 10% chance of a cursed [[magic marker]]; otherwise:
** 10% chance of either a cursed +1 [[oil lamp]] or two cursed [[torch]]es (equal probability)
The starting pet is always a [[pony]] with a [[saddle]].

==Skills==
Their skillset is a mesh of the Knight and Priest:

Paladins gain the following [[intrinsic]]s:

==Quest==
[[Erec]] sends you to fight [[Alduin]] for the [[Cudgel of Cuthbert]]. The maps are copies from the [[Knight quest]], filled with [[dragon]]s. Random monster generation is biased towards [[human zombie]]s and [[wraith]]s.

==Gods==
Like [[Priest]]s, their pantheon is randomly chosen from one of the other roles.

==Rank titles==

* XL 10-13: Returned One
